Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Name
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements Name

Creates a player. Holds their turn value (player order), their square value, their name, and their image.

Version:
5/19/16
Author:
Jake Hatfield

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(int playerOrder,
              int squareValue,
              java.lang.String name,
              javax.swing.ImageIcon image)
Creates the player and holds their turn value (player order), their square value, their name, and their image.

Parameters:
playerOrder - the player order or turn value. ie: player 1 = 1
squareValue - the square value for the players image ie: player 1 = 11
name - the name of the player
image - the image of the player, png or jpg image file as an ImageIcon

Gets the square value for the player. This value is where the image is stored.

Returns:
the square value for the player

Sets the image of the player.

Parameters:
image - the image of the player in jpg or png fileformat
